content: That is actually false. Or at least in theory. Because you can remove SegWit entirely without loss of funds if everyone moved their funds back to legacy coins beforehand. Now, that would be almost impossible, and would need a lot of planning. But what if we say SegWit can be activated, but only for 16 months. After that it must be turned into a hardfork or it will get deactivated. Could be a nice compromise ;)
